content:
Hey, I got a strange error in CI https://github.com/rust-lang-ci/rust/runs/5260363884?check_suite_focus=true#step:26:43985
but the rollup does not modify the file actually...
https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/94164
I think the error might be caused by some behaviour change of rustdoc (there are rustdoc changes in the rollup) but I couldn't see a test that looks like it covers the error...

Any clues what might be happening here?
well I excluded all rustdoc prs from the rollup, let's see how that goes :/
The doc link occurs inside an invocation of the macro that #93878 overhauls
Perhaps the hygiene behavior changed in that PR
The rustdoc PRs in your rollup should be unrelated

urgh, would never have guessed that :D
thanks!
